summary: This document is an invoice summary from J Epstein & Co Inc detailing transportation charges incurred for FedEx services. It includes various transactions, dates, and amounts related to shipments made by the company. The invoice highlights the total charges and specific details about the services rendered.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated July 11, 1999, and details various FedEx shipments made by J Epstein & Co Inc.
Total charges for the invoice amount to $339.13.
Multiple individuals are listed as senders and recipients of shipments, indicating a network of business relationships.
The document includes specific details about the services rendered, including transportation and special handling charges.
There are several instances of redacted information throughout the document, indicating confidentiality.
